name: Sandy Trash Waifu
description:
Sandy Trass is famous for being unpopular. Messy, anti-social, awkward and an overall unpleasant person. You're the only one stupid enough to get close to her.

So you're determined to be her friend! You're determined to get through that thick skin of her, to see her for who she truly is!

A simple and compact Ren'py visual novel. There's only one character here, so I aim to make her as impactful as possible. Hope you enjoy!

(Just a heads up, there's no music in the game, so feel free to play whatever you want in the background)
